function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Simplified model assumptions may not be generalizable across all settings","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of disease dynamics and ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Utilize more comprehensive and diverse data sources to capture a wider range of disease dynamics and mitigation scenarios","Technologies":"Advanced modeling techniques and data analytics","People":"Scientists, public health officials, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Neglect of factors that can negatively impact the efficacy of vector control, such as insecticide resistance and improper choice of insecticide","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of vector control measures and increased spread of mosquito-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Implement integrated pest management strategies and monitor for insecticide resistance","Technologies":"Insecticide resistance testing tools and integrated pest management technologies","People":"Vector control specialists, entomologists, and environmental health professionals","Owner":"Vector control agencies, environmental health organizations, and research institutions"},{"Description":"Neglect of seasonal fluctuation in mosquito biting habits, leading to inaccurate representations of disease transmission","Impact":"Ineffective long-term disease mitigation strategies and misinformed public health messaging","Mitigation":"Incorporate seasonal patterns of mosquito biting into the model and public health messaging","Technologies":"Seasonal modeling algorithms and data-driven public health communication tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health communicators, and community health educators","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and public health communication organizations"}]}
